meanings.sent1: Polyamorists believe in having multiple partners.
meanings.sent2: I have friends who are polyamorists and are in happy relationships with more than one person.
meanings.sent3: The polyamorists in our community always have interesting stories to share about their relationships.
meanings.sent4: To some, polyamorists are like social butterflies, spreading love to many.
meanings.sent5: The polyamorists I know are experts at balancing their multiple relationships.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in romantic relationships with multiple partners simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: Polyamorists enjoy the freedom to love more than one person at a time.
meanings.sent2: It can be challenging for polyamorists to manage their time between different partners.
meanings.sent3: At parties, polyamorists always have interesting dynamics with their multiple partners.
meanings.sent4: In a world full of monogamy, polyamorists stand out like colorful flowers in a garden.
meanings.sent5: The polyamorists I've met have taught me a lot about communication in relationships.
